title: Trump Links Hamas Disarmament to Gaza Peace and Details U.S. Actions in Venezuela
summary: President Trump emphasized that Hamas must disarm as a condition for advancing a peace deal in Gaza, highlighting his role in international diplomacy. Simultaneously, he confirmed a U.S. ground attack in Venezuela targeting drug trafficking operations, part of a broader military deployment in the Caribbean. This deployment has involved striking alleged drug boats and seizing Venezuelan oil tankers. Additionally, Trump mentioned accepting a claim from Russian President Vladimir Putin that Ukraine attempted an attack on a residence, showing his engagement with global leaders. The article covers Trump's multifaceted approach to foreign policy, addressing conflicts in the Middle East and anti-drug efforts in South America, while navigating relations with Russia. It underscores the complexities of peace negotiations and military interventions in volatile regions.
